entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 1:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -36.2°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 30.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
